sense.def:
A point
je nekaj, kar rečemo in izraža določeno dejstvo, idejo ali mnenje.

seg.quote: We had a long argument on this point.
I want to make several quick points.
Let me tell you a little story to illustrate my point.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekdo
has a point
, se nam tisto, kar pove, zdi vredno razmisleka.

seg.quote: You've got a point there.

sense.def:
The point of what someone is saying or discussing
je najpomembnejši del pripovedi ali razprave in v njem tiči tudi vzrok ali pojasnilo za vse drugo.

seg.quote: The point was that Dick could not walk.
You've all missed the point.
I may as well come straight to the point.

sense.def:
A point
je tudi podrobnost, vidik ali lastnost nečesa ali nekoga.

seg.quote: The two books have some interesting points in common.
Your strong points are your speed and accuracy.

sense.def:
Izraz
point
uporabljamo v zvezah kot
I don't see the point of it
,
what's the point
in
there's no point
, kadar želimo reči, da neko dejanje ni smiselno ali ne bi bilo koristno.

seg.quote: I didn't see the point of boring you with all this.
There was not much point in thinking about it.

sense.def:
A point
je tudi določeno mesto, kjer se nekaj zgodi.

seg.quote: We were nearing the point where the lane curved round to the right.
The circle passes through those two points.

sense.def:
The points of a compass
so točke na kompasu, ki kažejo določene smeri neba, zlasti sever, jug, vzhod in zahod.

The point of something
je oster končni del predmetov, kot so bucika, igla ali nož.

seg.quote: ...tapping with the point of the pencil at a place on the diagram.

sense.def:
The points on a railway track
so vzvodi in tračnice, ki vlaku omogočajo, da z enega tira preide na drugega.

The decimal point
je pika (v slovenščini vejica) pred decimalko.

seg.quote: ...four point eight.

sense.def:
Izraz
point
uporabljamo tudi za točno določen čas ali trenutek ali za določeno stopnjo v razvoju nečesa.

seg.quote: At one point, I was dreadfully rude.
The strikers brought the economy to crisis point.
I exercised to the point of exhaustion.

sense.def:
A point
je v nekaterih športih, tekmovanjih in igrah ena izmed več samostojnih ocen, ki se seštevajo za skupno oceno.

seg.quote: The panel of judges gave him the highest points.

sense.def:
A point
je tudi električna vtičnica v steni.

seg.quote: The room has a wash-basin and an electric-shaver point.

sense.def:
To point at something
pomeni iztegniti prst, palico ali drug podoben predmet v smeri nečesa, da nekomu pokažemo, kje tisto je, ali da ga opozorimo na tisto.

seg.quote: ‘Over there,’ she said and pointed to the door.
He pointed a finger at my friend and hissed with rage.

sense.def:
To point something at someone
pomeni usmeriti konico nečesa proti nekomu.

seg.quote: I had actually pointed a gun at someone.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
points to a place
ali
points in a particular direction
, kaže proti določenemu kraju ali v določeno smer.

seg.quote: ...a street sign that pointed down towards the cemetery.
One of its toes pointed backwards.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
points to a particular situation
, po tistem lahko sklepamo, da obstajajo ali se bodo pojavile določene okoliščine.

seg.quote: This activity points to the likelihood that an armed revolution is imminent.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
beside the point
, ni povezano z zadevo, o kateri govorimo.

To make a point of doing something
pomeni nekaj narediti namerno ali opazno.

seg.quote: I made a special point of being sociable.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj res
up to a point
, je res le delno.

seg.quote: He is right, but only up to a point.

sense.def:
To point out an object or place
pomeni ljudi opozarjati, naj nekaj pogledajo, ali jim kazati, kje nekaj je.

seg.quote: On car journeys we all used to shout and point out lovely places along the way.

sense.def:
To point out a fact or mistake
pomeni nekomu povedati za določeno dejstvo ali napako.

seg.quote: Mr Merritt pointed this problem out to you the other day.
She pointed out that he was wrong.
